医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
当心椅子：研究显示久坐的习惯会损害骨骼，导致体内脂肪增加研究人员将久坐和体力活动与身体脂肪等因素的关联进行了比较。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Beware-the-chair-sedentary-habits-harm-bones-contribute-to-higher-body-fat-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Beware-the-chair-sedentary-habits-harm-bones-contribute-to-higher-body-fat-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=704fe3e7-f6d7-4c6a-8b59-425350a3df33 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 08:25:00 -0400 Beware the chair: sedentary habits harm bones, contribute to higher body fat, study reveals
研究发现心理意象水平、情感体验和感知的气候变化风险之间存在因果关系研究人员探索了心理意象与气候变化风险的情绪感知之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-discovers-a-causal-link- Between-the-level-of-mental-imagery-affective-experience-and-perceived-risk-of-气候变化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Study-discovers-a-causal-link- Between-the-level-of-mental-imagery-affective-experience-and-perceived-risk-of-气候变化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d026f53e-444f-413c-8880-518bf203320e Fri, 23 Jun 2023 06:55:00 -0400 Study discovers a causal link between the level of mental imagery, affective experience, and perceived risk of climate change
Leibniz-HKI 和 Analytik Jena 开发候选药物自动测试设施2023 年 6 月 15 日星期四，一个新的机器人平台在莱布尼茨天然产物研究和感染生物学研究所 (Leibniz-HKI) 落成，图林根州研究、创新和经济发展国务秘书出席了仪式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Leibniz-HKI-and-Analytik-Jena-develop-facility-for-automated-testing-of-drug-candidates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Leibniz-HKI-and-Analytik-Jena-develop-facility-for-automated-testing-of-drug-candidates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0af7f621-9e30-4420-b068-cc0ec1498b08 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 06:42:00 -0400 Leibniz-HKI and Analytik Jena develop facility for automated testing of drug candidates
因拒绝堕胎护理而提起的医疗事故诉讼可能即将到来罗伊诉韦德案被推翻一年后，据报道，限制堕胎的州的许多医生和医院拒绝终止面临危及健康的并发症的妇女的怀孕，因为担心她们可能面临刑事起诉或吊销行医执照。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Malpractice-lawsuits-over-denied-abortion-care-may-be-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Malpractice-lawsuits-over-denied-abortion-care-may-be-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b970319-b90b-4ae1-be96-662d02e341e1 Fri, 23 Jun 2023 06:34:12 -0400 Malpractice lawsuits over denied abortion care may be on the horizon
支持者呼吁 911 变革。警方心情复杂。大量证据表明，警方常常无法对经历心理健康危机的人做出适当的反应。它可能导致本可以避免的死亡和精神疾病的刑事定罪，特别是在有色人种中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Advocates-call-for-911-changes-Police-have-mixed-feelings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/Advocates-call-for-911-changes-Police-have-mixed-feelings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a968f41-cd3e-4150-af2d-7251c7bf0f5d Fri, 23 Jun 2023 06:32:58 -0400 Advocates call for 911 changes. Police have mixed feelings.
使用细菌殖民者作为治疗载体在治疗癌症方面引起了越来越多的兴趣研究描述了使用工程共生细菌来增强抗肿瘤免疫力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/The-use-of-bacterial-colonists-as-therapy-riers-is-gaining-interest-for-treating-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230623/The-use-of-bacterial-colonists-as-therapy-riers-is-gaining-interest-for-treating-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23264e73-ea6b-4328-a75e-916b31d1b4dd Fri, 23 Jun 2023 06:24:00 -0400 The use of bacterial colonists as therapy carriers is gaining interest for treating cancer
